item.title: Add SSL Certificate with Lets Encrypt to Nginx on Ubuntu 20.04
item.description: Introduction In this tutorial you will learn how to install certbot which communicates with Let’s Encrypt. We will create an SSL certificate for our example.com domain and adapt the Nginx configuration as well as the ufw configuration.
